summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to minimum standards for the protection of the public health, safety, morals and general welfare in buildings used for human habitation, amending Sections 27.16.030, 27.24.030, 27.28.010, 27.30.020, 27.36.010, and 27.36.030 of the Housing Code (Ordinance No. 99112) to clarify the language thereof, to require the owner to secure vacant buildings, and to provide for issuance of certificates of compliances to additional parties.
